ComicInfo.Summary: It's the final showdown between THE LIVING CORPSE and his son, AGENT ROMERO! The Living Corpse and LILITH must escape the prison laboratories of Project Lazarus deep below the Pentagon. But escape is easier said than done when they have to fight their way through and army of Brainchild's cyborg soldiers and the final revenge of Agent Romero! After this THE LIVING CORPSE'S afterlife will never be the same! A perfect jumping on point for people who like to skip to the end of the story!
